text: I'm very sorry for your loss. My Dennis died of multiple organ failure. The very last thing he did before he passed was somehow walk to the centre of the room where we were all sitting. We were shocked to see him walk, but then he lay down in my dad's arms and closed his eyes forever. He knew he was leaving this world and wanted to be close to his family.
Should've fucked with her by fake coughing around her. A lot.
Thank you for being such a good friend.

Ah yes! Female misogynists.


If this bitch continues, report her for harassment.
